data.eml:eml: Five species of the genus Epicephala Meyrick, 1880 (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Houhun, Zhang, Zhenguo (2016): Five species of the genus Epicephala Meyrick, 1880 (Lepidoptera: Gracillariidae) from China. Zootaxa 4084 (3): 391-405, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4084.3.5
